trans-unit.source: Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management.
trans-unit.target: Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: This guide shows you how to modify the look and feel of the developer portal in API Management for consistency with your brand.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows you how to modify the look and feel of the developer portal in API Management for consistency with your brand.

trans-unit.source: Change the text/logo in the page header
trans-unit.target: Change the text/logo in the page header

trans-unit.source: One of the key aspects of portal customization is replacing the text at the top of all pages with your company name or logo.
trans-unit.target: One of the key aspects of portal customization is replacing the text at the top of all pages with your company name or logo.

trans-unit.source: Content within the Developer Portal is modified via the Publisher portal, which is accessed through the Azure management portal.
trans-unit.target: Content within the Developer Portal is modified via the Publisher portal, which is accessed through the Azure management portal.

trans-unit.source: To reach the API publisher portal, click **Manage** in the Azure Portal for your API Management service.
trans-unit.target: To reach the API publisher portal, click **Manage** in the Azure Portal for your API Management service.

trans-unit.source: Publisher portal
trans-unit.target: Publisher portal

trans-unit.source: The developer portal is based on a Content Management System or CMS.
trans-unit.target: The developer portal is based on a Content Management System or CMS.

trans-unit.source: The header that appears on every page is a special type of content known as a widget.
trans-unit.target: The header that appears on every page is a special type of content known as a widget.

trans-unit.source: To edit the contents of that widget click **Widgets** from the **Developer Portal** menu on the left, and then select the **Header** widget from the list.
trans-unit.target: To edit the contents of that widget click **Widgets** from the **Developer Portal** menu on the left, and then select the **Header** widget from the list.

trans-unit.source: Widgets header
trans-unit.target: Widgets header

trans-unit.source: The contents of the header is editable from within the **Body** field.
trans-unit.target: The contents of the header is editable from within the **Body** field.

trans-unit.source: Change the text to "Fabrikam Developer Portal" and click **Save** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Change the text to "Fabrikam Developer Portal" and click **Save** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Now you should be able to see the new header on every page within the developer portal!
trans-unit.target: Now you should be able to see the new header on every page within the developer portal!

trans-unit.source: To open the developer portal while in the publisher portal, click on **Developer portal** in the top bar.
trans-unit.target: To open the developer portal while in the publisher portal, click on **Developer portal** in the top bar.

trans-unit.source: Change the styling of the headers
trans-unit.target: Change the styling of the headers

trans-unit.source: The colors, fonts, sizes, spacings and other style-related elements of any page on the portal are defined by style rules.
trans-unit.target: The colors, fonts, sizes, spacings and other style-related elements of any page on the portal are defined by style rules.

trans-unit.source: To edit the styles click on **Appearance** from the **Developer portal** menu in the Publisher portal.
trans-unit.target: To edit the styles click on **Appearance** from the **Developer portal** menu in the Publisher portal.

trans-unit.source: Then click on **Begin customization** to enable the styling editor.
trans-unit.target: Then click on **Begin customization** to enable the styling editor.

trans-unit.source: Your browser will switch to a hidden page within the developer portal that contains samples of content, with examples for all styling rules used anywhere on the site.
trans-unit.target: Your browser will switch to a hidden page within the developer portal that contains samples of content, with examples for all styling rules used anywhere on the site.

trans-unit.source: To open the styling editor, move your cursor over the thin gray vertical line on the left-most part of the page.
trans-unit.target: To open the styling editor, move your cursor over the thin gray vertical line on the left-most part of the page.

trans-unit.source: The editor toolbar should appear.
trans-unit.target: The editor toolbar should appear.

trans-unit.source: Customization toolbar
trans-unit.target: Customization toolbar

trans-unit.source: There are two main modes of editing styling rules - **Edit all rules** displays a list of all the style rules used anywhere; while **Pick element** allows you to select an element from the page you are on and will display styles only for that element.
trans-unit.target: There are two main modes of editing styling rules - **Edit all rules** displays a list of all the style rules used anywhere; while **Pick element** allows you to select an element from the page you are on and will display styles only for that element.

trans-unit.source: In this section we would like to change the styling of only the headers.
trans-unit.target: In this section we would like to change the styling of only the headers.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Pick element** option from the styling editor toolbar and then click on **Select an element to customize**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Pick element** option from the styling editor toolbar and then click on **Select an element to customize**.

trans-unit.source: Elements will now become highlighted as you hover over them with the mouse to signify what element's styles you would start editing if you click.
trans-unit.target: Elements will now become highlighted as you hover over them with the mouse to signify what element's styles you would start editing if you click.

trans-unit.source: Move the mouse over the text representing the company name in the header ("Fabrikam Developer Portal" if you followed the instructions in the previous section) and click on it.
trans-unit.target: Move the mouse over the text representing the company name in the header ("Fabrikam Developer Portal" if you followed the instructions in the previous section) and click on it.

trans-unit.source: A set of named and categorized styling rules will appear within the styling editor.
trans-unit.target: A set of named and categorized styling rules will appear within the styling editor.

trans-unit.source: Each rule represents a styling property of the selected element.
trans-unit.target: Each rule represents a styling property of the selected element.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the header text selected above, the size of the text is in @font-size-h1 while the name of the font with alternatives is in @headings-font-family.
trans-unit.target: For example, for the header text selected above, the size of the text is in @font-size-h1 while the name of the font with alternatives is in @headings-font-family.

trans-unit.source: If you're familiar with [bootstrap][], these rules are in fact [LESS variables][] within the bootstrap theme used by the developer portal.
trans-unit.target: If you're familiar with [bootstrap][], these rules are in fact [LESS variables][] within the bootstrap theme used by the developer portal.

trans-unit.source: Let's change the color of the heading text.
trans-unit.target: Let's change the color of the heading text.

trans-unit.source: Select the entry in the **@headings-color** field and type #000000.
trans-unit.target: Select the entry in the **@headings-color** field and type #000000.

trans-unit.source: This is the hex code for the color black.
trans-unit.target: This is the hex code for the color black.

trans-unit.source: As you do this you will see that a square color indicator will appear at the end of the text box.
trans-unit.target: As you do this you will see that a square color indicator will appear at the end of the text box.

trans-unit.source: If you click this indicator, a color picker will allow you to choose a color.
trans-unit.target: If you click this indicator, a color picker will allow you to choose a color.

trans-unit.source: Color picker
trans-unit.target: Color picker

trans-unit.source: When you are done with making changes to the styles of the selected element click on **Preview Changes** to see the results on the screen.
trans-unit.target: When you are done with making changes to the styles of the selected element click on **Preview Changes** to see the results on the screen.

trans-unit.source: At this time they are only visible to Administrators.
trans-unit.target: At this time they are only visible to Administrators.

trans-unit.source: To make these changes visible to everyone, click on **Publish** button in the styling editor and confirm the changes.
trans-unit.target: To make these changes visible to everyone, click on **Publish** button in the styling editor and confirm the changes.

trans-unit.source: Publish menu
trans-unit.target: Publish menu

trans-unit.source: To change the style rules that apply to any other element on the page follow the same procedure as you did for the header - click on **Pick an element** from the styling editor, select the element you are interested in, and start modifying the values of the style rules displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: To change the style rules that apply to any other element on the page follow the same procedure as you did for the header - click on **Pick an element** from the styling editor, select the element you are interested in, and start modifying the values of the style rules displayed on the screen.

trans-unit.source: Edit the contents of a page
trans-unit.target: Edit the contents of a page

trans-unit.source: The developer portal consists of automatically generated pages like APIs, Products, Applications, Issues and manually written content.
trans-unit.target: The developer portal consists of automatically generated pages like APIs, Products, Applications, Issues and manually written content.

trans-unit.source: Since it is based on a content management system you can create such content as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Since it is based on a content management system you can create such content as necessary.

trans-unit.source: To see the list of all existing content pages click on **Content** from the **Developer portal** menu in the publisher portal.
trans-unit.target: To see the list of all existing content pages click on **Content** from the **Developer portal** menu in the publisher portal.

trans-unit.source: Manage content
trans-unit.target: Manage content

trans-unit.source: Click on the "Welcome" page to edit what is displayed on the home page of the developer portal.
trans-unit.target: Click on the "Welcome" page to edit what is displayed on the home page of the developer portal.

trans-unit.source: Make the changes you would like, preview them if necessary, and then click on **Publish Now** to make them visible to everyone.
trans-unit.target: Make the changes you would like, preview them if necessary, and then click on **Publish Now** to make them visible to everyone.

trans-unit.source: The home page uses a special layout which allows it to display a banner at the top.
trans-unit.target: The home page uses a special layout which allows it to display a banner at the top.

trans-unit.source: This banner is not editable from the Content section.
trans-unit.target: This banner is not editable from the Content section.

trans-unit.source: To edit this banner click on **Widgets** from the **Developer portal** menu, then select **Home page** from the **Current Layer** drop-down and then open the **Banner** item under the Featured section.
trans-unit.target: To edit this banner click on **Widgets** from the **Developer portal** menu, then select **Home page** from the **Current Layer** drop-down and then open the **Banner** item under the Featured section.

trans-unit.source: The contents of this widget are editable just like any other page.
trans-unit.target: The contents of this widget are editable just like any other page.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Check out the other topics in the [Get started with advanced API configuration][] tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Check out the other topics in the [Get started with advanced API configuration][] tutorial.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
